attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to make a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump's previously documented misogyny and vulgarity should not disqualifies him from being received by Her Majesty the Queen or the Prince of Wales. The UK believes in reform and should not hold previous actions against anyone.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government. He should be given the same privilege as any other previous US President and offered an invitation of an Official State Visit. This is a proud tradition of the UK and Her Majesty the Queen.
